amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete the provisions of current law that prohibit military personnel from obtaining privately funded abortions at DOD medical facilities overseas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to repeal provisions of current law that prohibit privately-funded abortions at overseas Defense Department medical facilities. The effect of the amendment would be to allow the restoration of regulations that permit abortions for service members and their dependents at overseas Defense Department medical facilities---provided the woman pays for the abortion.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Harman amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 196 - 224 (Roll no. 217).
